catalog_script_client.name: Auto populate district

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_d57d29fc833132107f44d4abc1da1e80
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Charging Request">4888cee8837932107f44d4abc1da1ee8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d888022c837932107f44d4abc1da1e4e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto populate district</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	g_form.addInfoMessage(newValue);
    var locationGr = new GlideRecord("cmn_location");
    if (locationGr.get("name", newValue)) {
        var value = locationGr.getValue("u_district");
        g_form.setValue('district', value);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zachery.howton</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-11 08:45:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d57d29fc833132107f44d4abc1da1e80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto populate district</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ChargeSOS" source="x_cdltd_chargesos">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ChargeSOS">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d57d29fc833132107f44d4abc1da1e80</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zachery.howton</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-11 09:09:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
